responses: 1: No, unlikely, but there is a chance it would happen.
2: Yes, probably, but there is a chance it would fail.
citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
question: If the legislature, or either chamber of the legislature, took actions to remove the head of state from office, would it be likely to succeed even without having to level accusations of unlawful activity and without the involvement of any other agency?
name: v2exremhsp, *_osp, *_ord
